ValidMaintainers.Description: GitHub users who maintain this folder. PR for changing this folder will only be accepted from these users.

CommunityInfo.Name: Microsoft Technical Trainers
CommunityInfo.Description_SessionizeApiId: If you have configured your Sessionize correctly then browsing to this url (replacing {Your sessionize event Id} with your event sessionize id) will return valid json: https://sessionize.com/api/v2/v0ndopbd/view/Sessions

Logo.Description: Community logo is a .png file 500X500px named {foldername}.png.
